tas.label: Average Mean Surface Air Temperature
tas.description: Average mean temperature over the aggregation period

tasmax.label: Average Maximum Surface Air Temperature
tasmax.description: Average daily maximum temperature over the aggregation period

tasmin.label: Average Minimum Surface Air Temperature
tasmin.description: Average daily minimum temperature over the aggregation period

txx.label: Maximum of Daily Max-Temperature
txx.description: The single-day maximum value of the daily maximum temperatures over the aggregated data period

tnn.label: Minimum of Daily Min-Temperature
tnn.description: The single-day minimum value of the daily minimum temperatures over the aggregated data period

prpercnt.label: Precipitation Percent Change
prpercnt.description: Projected percent change in total precipitation; anomaly only

rx1day.label: Average Largest 1-Day Precipitation
rx1day.description: The average highest precipitation amount in a 1-day period during each month

rx5day.label: Average Largest 5-Day Cumulative Precipitation
rx5day.description: The average highest precipitation amount over a consecutive 5-day period

r20mm.label: Number of Days with Precipitation >20mm
r20mm.description: The number of heavy precipitation days during the aggregation period

r50mm.label: Number of Days with Precipitation >50mm
r50mm.description: The number of very heavy precipitation days during the aggregation period

hi35.label: Number of Days with Heat Index > 35°C
hi35.description: Days where the Heat Index >= 35°C including atmospheric moisture

tr.label: Number of Tropical Nights (T-min > 20°C)
tr.description: Days where daily minimum temperature remained >= 20°C

tr23.label: Number of Tropical Nights (T-min > 23°C)
tr23.description: Days where daily minimum temperature remained >= 23°C

spei12.label: Annual SPEI Drought Index
spei12.description: Standardized Precipitation Evapotranspiration Index - integrated water deficit measure

cdd.label: Max Number of Consecutive Dry Days

cwd.label: Max Number of Consecutive Wet Days

wsdi.label: Warm Spell Duration Index
wsdi.description: Days in sequences of at least 6 consecutive days with max temp > 90th percentile

csdi.label: Cold Spell Duration Index
csdi.description: Days in sequences of at least 6 consecutive days with min temp < 10th percentile

fd.label: Number of Frost Days
fd.description: Days where daily minimum temperature is < 0°C

id.label: Number of Ice Days
id.description: Days where daily maximum temperature is < 0°C

hdtrpopdensitycat.label: Temperature-Based Heat + Population Risk
hdtrpopdensitycat.description: Combined heat and population density risk categorization (0-4 scale)
